text_elements.typography_notes: The brush script style gives a dynamic and artistic feel, but may affect readability at smaller sizes.

color_palette.contrast_notes: High contrast with white background ensures readability.

layout.balance_notes: The composition is balanced with equal emphasis on both text elements.
layout.spacing_notes: Adequate white space around the elements enhances focus.

issues.description: Brush script may be hard to read at small sizes.

improvement_cues.suggestion: Consider a more readable font for smaller applications.

trend_alignment.notes: Aligns well with current trends favoring artistic and creative designs.
